nodes.text: The CN-12 sensor chip was one of the objects needed for the completion of the Silencer. The CN-12 was kept on Nar Shaddaa until the Sith Lord Kallig, with the help of the Cult of the Screaming Blade, retrieved the CN-12 to use for the Silencer being constructed under Moff Pyron to use against Darth Thanaton.
